nodes.text: The Gozanti Armed Transport was a model of armed transport that came into service by 35 ABY. Starships of the class participated in the Battle of Exegol as part of a citizens' fleet of volunteer civilians from across the galaxy gathered by former Rebel Alliance General Lando Calrissian, which took up arms to assist in the defeat of the resurgent Darth Sidious and the Sith Eternal's attempt at galactic domination.
